name: optical
content:

relating to light or the ability to see: The glowing cloud was an optical effect. Her eye tests revealed that she has no optical defects.
used in order to see something better: There are specialized optical aids which can help visually impaired people. cameras, binoculars and other optical instruments
computing
  specialized reading or storing information using light: Optical drives displaced floppy disks and magnetic tape. optical disks
